---
title: "How do the top 3 types of cancer death vary among each race and ethnicity over the past 10 years?"
author: "Lily, Lauren, Shubhika"
editor: visual
---

This project was developed as part of **DSCI 245: Practicum in Data Science** at Lewis & Clark College.

> *"An academic and experiential bridge between classroom theory and real-world application in the domain of data science."*

![](images/clipboard-2476513917.png){fig-align="center" width="321"}

In collaboration with the **Multnomah County Health Department**, this project explores cancer mortality trends over the past decade across different racial and ethnic groups in the county. Through statistical analysis and visual storytelling, we aim to highlight disparities and inform future public health interventions.
